name: Space Odissey
description:
This is my first 2D platformer made following the online especialization by Michigan state university.

Thanks for playing!

Changes I made to the game:

  • 2 unique levels (Tutorial and challenge) and one level selection level.
  • I added a game selection level from which you can enter the other levels. To enter the levels I created a portal with custom code
  • The keys obtained inside the levels stay in the key ring until a new game is initiated and they are shown in the UI in the bottom left side.
  • I created a new door animation with laser bars.
  • I changed the level cleared pickup animation to another astronaut and animated it.
  • In tutorial level I added multiple UI instructions screens activated with a custom pickup.

Note: There is a minor bug when going from the game to the menu and then pressing new game again, where the character stays fixed mid air, It is fixed by pausing and un-pausing the game.
